statements: DELETE FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE strength_gains > 50 AND training_volume < 1000;
DELETE FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND athlete_name = 'John';
DELETE FROM athlete_progress WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM training_volume WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND volume_metric > 500;
DELETE FROM progress_reports WHERE athlete_id = 101 AND report_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM training_volume WHERE intensity_level > 3 AND date < '2022-03-20';
DELETE FROM strength_gains WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND muscle_group = 'Legs';
